com.brashmonkey.spriter

Interface Player.PlayerListener

  • Enclosing class:
    Player

    public static interface Player.PlayerListener
    A listener to listen for specific events which can occur during the runtime of a Player instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void animationChanged(Animation oldAnim, Animation newAnim)
      Gets called if the animation of the player gets changed.
      void animationFinished(Animation animation)
      Gets called if the current animation has reached it's end or it's beginning (depends on the current set Player.speed).
      void mainlineKeyChanged(Mainline.Key prevKey, Mainline.Key newKey)
      Gets called if the mainline key gets changed.
      void postProcess(Player player)
      Gets called after a player updated the current animation.
      void preProcess(Player player)
      Gets called before a player updates the current animation.

    • Method Detail

      • animationFinished

        void animationFinished(Animation animation)
        Gets called if the current animation has reached it's end or it's beginning (depends on the current set Player.speed).
        Parameters:
        animation - the animation which finished.

      • animationChanged

        void animationChanged(Animation oldAnim,
                      Animation newAnim)
        Gets called if the animation of the player gets changed. If Player.setAnimation(Animation) gets called and the new animation is the same as the previous one, this method will not be called.
        Parameters:
        oldAnim - the old animation
        newAnim - the new animation

      • preProcess

        void preProcess(Player player)
        Gets called before a player updates the current animation.
        Parameters:
        player - the player which is calling this method.

      • postProcess

        void postProcess(Player player)
        Gets called after a player updated the current animation.
        Parameters:
        player - the player which is calling this method.

      • mainlineKeyChanged

        void mainlineKeyChanged(Mainline.Key prevKey,
                        Mainline.Key newKey)
        Gets called if the mainline key gets changed. If Player.speed is big enough it can happen that mainline keys between the previous and the new mainline key will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        prevKey - the previous mainline key
        newKey - the new mainline key
